org.openftc.revextensions2

Class ExpansionHubMotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorImpl
      • com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorImplEx
        • org.openftc.revextensions2.ExpansionHubMotor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor, com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorEx, com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple, com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareDevice

    public class ExpansionHubMotor
extends com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorImplEx
    Extends a DcMotorImplEx to provide access to new features. Note: motor MUST be attached to an Expansion Hub.
